pro forma invoice.translation[0].definit: a document like a bill that is sent to the customer to show what a price would be if he or she made an order
pro forma invoice.translation[1].definit: an invoice sent to a customer asking for payment before goods are sent, often done when the buyer is a new customer
The supplier may issue a payment request note or a pro forma invoice.
an invoice sent to a possible buyer as an example of prices etc of different goods
Dealer inquiries welcome - discount rates and pro forma invoices on request.
